title: Bli en del av Arizon – fortsätt din resa i en stark gemenskap!
description:
Har du flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare och funderar på vad du ska göra härnäst?


Vill du arbeta i en miljö där du får fortsätta utvecklas, omgiven av människor som stöttar varandra och delar din passion för teknik?


Välkommen till Arizon – ett konsultbolag som kombinerar gemenskap och tekniskt intresse med viljan att vara bäst inom vår nisch.

**Om Arizon**


Arizon är ett mindre konsultbolag med kontor i Stockholm men med kunder över hela Norden. Vi är ett gäng seniora utvecklare som tillsammans hjälper företag att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar och bygga framtidens digitala lösningar. Våra kunder är allt från några av Sveriges mest kända varumärken till startups i Silicon Valley.


I takt med att vi växer söker vi nu fler seniora utvecklare som vill arbeta som konsulter och som ser charmen i att vara en del av ett mindre bolag med stark gemenskap, högt i tak och där alla får ta plats.


Warhammer-spelare, operasångare, stjärnskådare, parkourfantaster, friluftsmänniskor, bandyproffs och framför allt föräldrar – vi finns alla här, och arbetar tillsammans på samma villkor.

**Vem du är**

* Har minst 8 års erfarenhet som utvecklare – men är ännu bättre än vad som står på pappret.
* Är skicklig inom din nisch, t.ex. .NET, Java eller JavaScript - med koll på det senaste.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med cloud, microtjänster och API:er och trivs med tekniskt tunga lösningar.
* Är självgående, social och problemlösande samt tar ansvar för din leverans.
* Är strukturerad och duktig på kommunikation.
* Är ödmjuk, engagerad och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap.

**Vad vi erbjuder**

* Trygg anställning från start, med bra ersättning och förmåner.
* Transparent ersättningsmodell – tre olika lönemodeller att välja mellan beroende på vad som passar din livsstil.
* Full support – vi hanterar allt kring sälj, kunddialoger och avtal, så att du kan fokusera på det du gör bäst.
* Bonusprogram som belönar dig när du bidrar till Arizons tillväxt.
* Gemensamma luncher, kick-offs och ett engagerat nätverk av kollegor.
* En fantastiskt trevlig företagskultur!

**Varför arbeta på Arizon?**


Det finns många konsultbolag som alla har sina modeller och sin syn på hur verksamheten ska byggas. På Arizon har vi alltid haft målet att skapa en familjär kulturbsom bygger på transparens och lika villkor för alla, något vi är stolta över att ha lyckatsb med. Hos oss finns ingen hierarki, bara frihet under ansvar. Allt för att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för seniora konsulter mitt i familjelivet.


Eftersom vi alla balanserar jobb och familjeliv har vi inga obligatoriska aktiviteter utöver det vanliga arbetet. I stället satsar vi på två riktigt bra kick-offs per år – senast flög vi stridsflygsimulatorer och avslutade kvällen med en klassisk trerättersmiddag. Kul är bara förnamnet!


Slutligen kännetecknas vi alla av ett stort tekniskt intresse och en opretentiös inställning. Vi tar ansvar för vår egen leverans, men vet att vi alltid får fullt stöd om något inte fungerar.

**Låter detta som en resa och kultur du vill vara en del av?**


Hör gärna av dig så berättar vi mer och ser om vi är en bra match för varandra.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Architect AWS
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens molnlösningar?
   

  

 Du blir en del av Capgeminis Cloud & Infrastructure Services (CIS)-enhet med fokus på projekt- och konsulttjänster i Norden. Vårt mål är att erbjuda kunder helhetslösningar inom Cloud och vi erbjuder en mängd olika tjänster till våra kunder, från strategisk rådgivning till projektgenomförande.
   

  

*I denna roll kommer du ha en nyckelroll i att:*
* Designa och implementera komplexa, skalbara och säkra AWS-lösningar anpassade efter kundens behov
* Ge teknisk vägledning och support vid felsökning under en hel projektleverans
* Samarbeta med intressenter för att samla in krav och föreslå effektiva migrationsstrategier
* Agera som en betrodd rådgivare till kunder gällande branschtrender och ny teknik
* Dela kunskap inom organisationen genom mentorskap, utbildning och skapande av återanvändbara artefakter


**Din Profil**
* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av praktisk design av molnbaserad företagsarkitektur, lagrings- och nätverkslösningar
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att bygga, migrera och modernisera företagsapplikationer på enterprisenivå
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av molntransformation
* AWS-certifieringar på professionell nivå (t.ex. Solutions Architect Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) samt erfarenhet av automatisering och skriptning (t.ex. Terraform, Python, CDK, shell, Ruby, Powershell)
* Kunskap om säkerhets- och efterlevnadsstandarder (t.ex. HIPAA, GDPR)
* Flytande i Svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Önskvärda kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av AWS-tjänster (t.ex. AWS Application Migration Service (MGN), Cloud Migration Factory, Portfolio analysis tooling) samt hantering av storskaliga migreringar från datacenter till datacenter och/eller från datacenter till molnet; drift av datacenter (t.ex. datasäkring, övervakning, larm och notifieringar)
* Erfarenhet av att integrera AWS AI/ML-tjänster (SageMaker, Bedrock, Amazon Q); förståelse för styrning inom AI/ML och ansvarsfulla AI-praktiker


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
* Konkurrenskraftig lön, förmånliga tjänstepensioner och kollektivavtal som ger trygghet
* Fokus på din hälsa och ditt välmående, med initiativ för att skapa balans mellan jobb och fritid
* En arbetsmiljö med kollegor som stöttar och inspirerar varandra, och chefer som har ditt bästa i fokus
* Brett utbud av karriärmöjligheter och tillgång till Capgeminis stora utbildningskatalog, särskilt inom den senaste teknologin för t.ex. cloud och generativ AI
* En företagskultur där mångfald och inkludering värdesätts högt


**Ansökan**
*I denna rekrytering hanterar vi ansökningar löpande. Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Jessica Fogelsjöö, Jessica.fogelsjoo@capgemini.com.*
 Till denna roll söker vi medarbetare för säkerhetsklassat uppdrag placerad hos kund.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Cloud Workspace Engineer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose smoke-free enjoyment. How? By offering people other nicotine products online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with eleven store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 300 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to smoke-free alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 Ready to transform the way we work?
   

  

 At Haypp, we’re building smarter, faster, and more secure IT environments and we want you on our team. As our Cloud Workspace Engineer, you’ll design and deliver cutting-edge cloud solutions that keep us agile and ahead of the curve. If you thrive on solving complex challenges, automating processes, and collaborating across teams, this is your chance to make a real impact.
   

  

**WHAT YOU WILL DO:**
 Your role as a Cloud Workspace Engineer and IT generalist will be diverse and hands-on. You’ll:
   

  

* Design and deploy cloud workspaces using Microsoft technologies like Azure AD, Office 365, and SharePoint.
* Secure and manage endpoints with Microsoft Intune, Defender, and Purview, ensuring compliance and a seamless user experience across Windows, MacOS, and mobile platforms.
* Identity & Access Management (IAM) and maintain Single Sign-On (SSO) and MFA across internal and third-party applications.
* Drive IT projects that make our systems scalable, compliant, and future-ready, whether migrating legacy systems or rolling out new SaaS solutions.
* Automate repetitive tasks using scripting (PowerShell, Bash, Python), from user provisioning to compliance reporting.
* Maintain and improve IT documentation, including troubleshooting guides and disaster recovery playbooks.
* Support cross-functional initiatives, such as integrating new business apps, optimizing collaboration tools, and enabling secure remote work.
* Monitor and optimize cloud performance, conduct audits, and implement best practices for data protection and disaster recovery.


**Examples of Projects You Might** 
**Managed:**
* Migrating legacy systems to Microsoft 365 for a modern, cloud-first workplace.
* Rolling out Zero Trust security architecture, including conditional access and MFA.
* Automating employee onboarding workflows with scripts for provisioning accounts and devices.
* Implementing advanced compliance and data protection measures using Microsoft Purview.
* Integrating new SaaS applications with seamless SSO and IAM configurations.
* Optimizing Teams and SharePoint for better collaboration in hybrid teams.
* Developing disaster recovery strategies and conducting failover tests.
* Building dashboards for IT asset management and security posture monitoring.


**What** 
**We’re Looking For:**
* Proficiency in Azure and Microsoft 365 tools and services.
* Experience in Windows endpoint management; MacOS, iOS, and Android knowledge is a plus.
* Expertise in IAM and SSO federation protocols.
* Familiarity with IT Service Management and Asset Management.
* Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or equivalent experience.
* Certifications like Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert is a plus.


**YOU WILL THRIVE HERE IF YOU:**
* Likes taking ownership and thrives on responsibility, someone who sees challenges as opportunities to deliver impact.
* Has a strong commitment to quality and security, ensuring every solution is reliable and future-proof.
* Is proactive and resourceful, always looking for ways to improve processes and automate repetitive tasks.
* Brings collaboration and adaptability, working seamlessly with different teams and stakeholders.
* Maintains a continuous learning mindset, staying ahead of tech trends and embracing innovation.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *Inclusion and Non-Hierarchy* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Lea Sjösten at lea.sjosten@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With 11 e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 100 000 consumers.

title: Tech Strategy
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization now includes around 200 highly skilled professionals.
   

  

 Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to
   

  

**About The Role**
 Technology is a core driver of Odevo’s growth and success, and the Tech Strategy Team helps ensure we make the right strategic choices, at the right time. As part of this small, high-impact team, you will work on a wide range of strategic and analytical topics across the Tech organisation.
   

  

 Your work will span
 **early shaping of new** 
 strategic initiatives,
 **product and technology strategy** 
 ,
 **M&A support** 
 ,
 **operating-model improvements** 
 , and
 **special projects** 
 of high priority to the CPTO and Tech Management Team. You will help identify opportunities, define strategic options, validate feasibility, and turn ideas into structured plans.
   

  

 Typical work includes conducting strategic analyses, building business cases, synthesizing insights for senior leaders, supporting due-diligence processes, assessing new technology capabilities (e.g. AI), and helping refine how Odevo Tech operates as we scale globally.
   

  

 You will collaborate closely with senior leaders across Odevo’s global tech organisation, shared services, and markets. You will also contribute to governance processes, such as benefit-realisation tracking, KPI definition, and preparation of SteerCo, Board, or investor materials.
   

  

**Core Responsibilities**
* Conducting discovery/ early-stage analysis
* Driving qualification of new strategic initiatives (strategy definition, analysis, business case creation)
* Support the operational and financial governance of the Tech Value Creation Plan
* Creation of presentation material for market/ global management team level SteerCos, Board or pot. Investors


**Who You Are**
* Humble team player - You are unpretentious, care about people and always prioritise winning as a team
* Excellent communicator - capable of effectively communicating complex ideas to diverse audiences and building trust with a wide variety of stakeholders
* Problem solver - strong ability to quickly break down and understand a problem and identify its possible solutions
* Curious - You are passionate about learning and using your knowledge to constantly develop yourself, people around you and improve how we do things
* Effective - With structure and order, you independently drive multiple assignments and set ambitious goals
* Tech savvy - Technologically proficient and comfortable working in a fast-paced product development environment


**Experience**
* Background in management consulting or equivalent - either in strategy and/ or transformation with Digital/ Technology as a core focus
* Driven strategy/ strategic project execution in a technology environment, ideally in a start-up/ scale up business or innovation hub
* Well acquainted with working with product development teams, solid understanding of Agile ways of working and the dynamics of product development


**Skills & location**
* Advanced user of Microsoft PowerPoint and Excel
* Fluent in English
* This role is based in Stockholm, Sweden


**What We Offer**
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.


**Excited?**
 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, apply for this position!
   

  

 👉🏽 Why we formed Odevo
   

  

 🔍 About Odevo
   

  

 🌐 Our Software
   

  

 #msl

title: Cloud Services Advisor
description:
Acronis is a world leader in cyber protection, delivering natively integrated solutions that monitor, control, and protect the data that businesses and lives depend on. Driven by our passion to protect every workload, we’ve built the industry’s only all-in-one cyber protection platform. We are looking for a to join Cloud Services Advisor on our mission of protecting the digital world.
   

  

 The Cloud Services Advisor, reporting to the regional Cloud Recruitment Team Manager, will drive revenue growth by identifying, qualifying, and closing new service provider partnerships in the middle east. You will manage the entire sales cycle, from prospecting and lead generation to negotiation and contract closure, while collaborating closely with internal teams and distribution partners. This role requires a hunter mentality, strong communication skills, and a deep understanding of the cloud computing landscape.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Attract new Service Providers to Acronis by reaching out to prospects that have already engaged with Acronis through offline/online events, registered for trial, opened Acronis emails, etc.
* Source new Service Providers prospects via LinkedIn, Salesforce database, connections.
* Connect with Acronis potential Service Providers using the approved tools, including but not limited to Avaya, Zoom, Outlook, etc. to verify the interest level based on certain criteria and BANT qualification, such as: the environment, need, budget, pain points, competitors, decision makers, number of workloads they want to protect.
* All activities must be documented in Salesforce, demo sessions via Zoom should be done with camera on.
* Do the research before reaching out to a prospect and prepare questions based on it, using company’s web site, LinkedIn profile, any other public information about the company or contact
* Manage the whole sales cycle: qualification, negotiation, demo sessions with the involvement of the Solution Engineers if needed, negotiating, closing the deal by signing a contract offline or online
* Make sure to sign a contract with quality Service Providers, who are ready to invest into the business with Acronis and plan to stay for a long time
* Manage the pipeline: maintain Service Level to follow-up prospects, provide timely forecast to direct Manager or regional General Manager
* Align and sync with Distributors in the assigned region, including bi-weekly calls, joint marketing activities and events
* Co-operate with all related departments at Acronis to close the deal successfully: Solution Engineers, Support, Sales Enablement, Product Management, etc.
* Understand Acronis brand messages and communicate them effectively to prospects; respect and support sales' role in promoting a positive brand image
* Understand Acronis key competitors and effectively communicate differentiators ("kill points") of our products/solutions
* Receive coaching feedback and participate in individual coaching sessions
* Pass obligatory quarterly upskill training sessions


**What You Bring**
* 3+ years sales experience as Inside Sales Representative or Lead Development Representative
* Fluent English, both written and verbal
* Proven experience in a Cyber Security company demonstrating a strong understanding of industry practices and protocols is required
* Ability to articulate product’s different features, and answers any questions customers might have
* Have strong closing sales skills
* Experience with cold calling is preferred with a never give up attitude


**Who We Are**
 A Swiss company founded in Singapore in 2003, Acronis offers over twenty years of innovation with 15 offices worldwide and more than 1800 employees in 50+ countries. Acronis Cyber Protect is available in 26 languages in 150 countries and is used by over 20,000 service providers to protect over 750,000 businesses.
   

  

 Our corporate culture is focused on making a positive impact on the lives of each employee and the communities we serve. Mutual trust, respect and belief that we can contribute to the world everyday are the cornerstones of our team. Each member of our “A-Team” plays an instrumental role in driving the success of our innovative and expanding business. We seek individuals who excel in dynamic, global environments and have a never give up attitude, contributing to our collective growth and impact.
   

  

**OUR INTERVIEW PRACTICES**
 To maintain a fair and genuine hiring process, we kindly ask that all candidates participate in interviews without the assistance of AI tools or external prompts. Our interview process is designed to assess your individual skills, experiences, and communication style. We value authenticity and want to ensure we’re getting to know you—not a digital assistant. To help maintain this integrity, we ask to remove virtual backgrounds and include in-person interviews in our hiring process.
   

  

 Use of AI-generated responses or third-party support during live interviews may be grounds for disqualification from the recruitment process and a full criminal, education and identification background check is required for all new hires.
   

  

*Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.*

title: Presales Team Lead
description:
**Role:** 
 Presales Lead – SAP Solutions (S/4HANA & Manufacturing Focus)
 



**Experience (Years):** 
 15+ years
 



**Language requirement:** 
 Swedish & English
 



  





**Tata consultancy Services** 
 is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




  





 We are seeking a dynamic Presales Lead with 15+ years of experience to drive presales and solutioning activities for SAP-focused engagements, with a particular emphasis on S/4HANA business solutioning in the Manufacturing domain. The ideal candidate will independently manage RFP/RFI responses, craft compelling proposals, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-value SAP solutions that address client business needs.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





**SAP S/4HANA Solutioning & Presales** 




  




* Lead the creation of business-focused SAP S/4HANA solutions tailored to client requirements, especially for Manufacturing industry clients.
* Respond to RFPs/RFIs with value-driven proposals, focusing on SAP S/4HANA transformation programs, assessments, and cloud solutions.
* Articulate business value and competitive differentiation of SAP S/4HANA solutions, especially in early sales cycle stages.
* Support acquisition of new customer logos and contribute to overall portfolio growth strategy.



  





  





**Manufacturing Domain Expertise** 




  




* Demonstrate deep understanding of manufacturing business processes, industry trends, and challenges.
* Position SAP S/4HANA as a strategic enabler for digital transformation in manufacturing, including automation, supply chain optimization, and production planning.



  





**Functional SAP S/4HANA Modules (Expertise in at least a few of these areas)** 




  




* SAP S/4HANA Finance (FI/CO)
* SAP S/4HANA Sales & Distribution (SD)
* SAP S/4HANA Materials Management (MM)
* SAP S/4HANA Production Planning (PP)
* SAP S/4HANA Plant Maintenance (PM)
* SAP S/4HANA Quality Management (QM)
* SAP S/4HANA Supply Chain (SCM)
* SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing (Discrete & Process)
* SAP S/4HANA Procurement
* SAP S/4HANA Analytics & Reporting



  





**Bid Management** 




  




* Own the end-to-end bid process, including RFP/RFI analysis, response strategy, proposal writing, pricing coordination, and submission timelines.
* Ensure compliance with internal bid governance processes and client requirements.



  





**Stakeholder Coordination** 




  




* Collaborate with sales, delivery, finance, and legal teams to gather inputs and finalize proposals.
* Engage with clients through discussions, presentations, and workshops to support sales and solutioning efforts.



  





**Knowledge Management** 




  




* Maintain a repository of reusable assets, case studies, and templates to accelerate future bids.



  





**Governance & Delivery Support** 




  




* Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction across SAP programs and engagements.
* Provide updates to client senior management and participate in steering committees as needed.



  





**Required Qualifications & Experience** 




  




* Bachelor’s degree in engineering, Business, Computer Science, or related field; MBA preferred.
* 10+ years of experience in presales, solutioning, or bid management roles, with a strong focus on SAP solutions (especially S/4HANA).
* Proven track record of independently managing large and complex RFP/RFI responses for SAP projects.
* Strong understanding of SAP business processes, digital transformation, and cloud/infrastructure domains.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Proficiency in tools like MS Office, SharePoint, and bid management platforms.



  





**Preferred Attributes** 




  




* Experience working with global clients in sectors such as Manufacturing, Telecom, BFSI, or Retail.
* Exposure to AI-led platforms, automation, and hybrid cloud solutions.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple bids simultaneously.
* Willingness to travel for client workshops or solution presentations.
* Experience in global delivery models and multicultural environments.



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com** 




  





**Privacy Note: https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

**Duration:** 
 Until 30th November + possible extensions
 



**Utilisation:** 
 40 Hours per week
 



**Fluent Languages:** 
 English / Swedish
 



  





**Job Summary / Key Skills**



* Design, model, and transform data to support analytics and reporting needs.
* Ensure data quality, reliability, and usability for analysts, decision-makers, and development teams.
* Define and promote best practices for data modeling, code structure, and documentation to support long-term, scalable solutions.
* Strong proficiency in SQL.
* Extensive hands-on experience with Data Vault and dimensional modeling (minimum 5 years).
* Experience working with cloud-based data platforms such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and BigQuery.
* Familiarity with version control tools such as Git or GitHub.



  





 If you are interested please apply with an up to date CV or email tom.carpenter@addanex.com for further information!

title: SENIOR PROGRAM MANAGER
description:
**Senior Program Manager**
 EuroBonus is SAS’ main tool for creating loyalty. We have more than 8 million members and are considered one of Europe’s leading loyalty programs with a highly engaged member base. Members of the program can gain levels and benefits and earn points that they spend on flight tickets, upgrades and other awards that can be bought for points.
   

  

 In addition to flying SAS, points and benefits can be achieved by engaging in the program through our many partners, both within the airline and travel industry and beyond. Points are earned on credit cards, hotel stays, rental cars, shopping and other products and services that our members interact with daily. Points can also be used to purchase products and services from many of our partners.
   

  

 Besides from driving loyalty to SAS, EuroBonus is a profit center that generates revenue from commission and selling points to partners.
   

  

**Challenges you will work on**
 We are looking for a strategic, analytical, and driven person to ensure attractive and engaging development of the program. In this role you will work with the overall strategic direction of the EuroBonus program and drive key strategic projects that will define the future of EuroBonus.
   

  

**Your Main Tasks Will Include**
* Manage key strategic projects
* Guide the strategic path of EuroBonus, and ensure coherence and right prioritization amongst the many developments within EuroBonus
* Input and feedback to colleagues in EuroBonus Program and Partner teams, so that all work is aligned to the above
* Participation in EuroBonus management team, together with Head of EuroBonus Program, Head of EuroBonus Partners and Senior Analytics Manager


**The team**
 EuroBonus consists of two teams: EuroBonus Program, responsible of the program structure, benefits and earn and use of points on flights, and EuroBonus Partners, responsible of the EuroBonus partnerships that our members can interact with in everyday life. The two teams work tightly together, and the position supports both teams. The position reports to Head of EuroBonus Program.
   

  

**To be successful, we believe you have**
* A relevant university degree and 5+ years of relevant professional experience
* Proven track record of owning and developing commercial concepts or portfolios, setting strategy and delivering against ambitious targets
* Proven experience of leading complex projects in a matrix organization
* Experience from the loyalty and airline industry is a plus
* Experience within e-commerce, agile ways of working, and leadership and/or coaching is a plus


**We Value Skills And Personal Qualities Such As**
* Strong strategic and commercial mindset, with the ability to understand the bigger picture while also optimizing key details
* Advanced analytical capability, including structuring large amounts of information, building business cases, performing analyses in Excel and translating data into clear, evidence-based recommendations for management
* Curious and results-driven, with a strong execution focus and interest in understanding what drives customer impact and business outcomes
* Strong communication, collaboration and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with both internal and external stakeholders
* Structured, analytical and flexible problem-solver, comfortable managing multiple initiatives in parallel
* Independent, proactive and self-driven, with the ability to take initiative and prioritize work effectively


**Why SAS?**
 At SAS, we offer extensive opportunities for professional development in an international, fast-paced working environment. We are dedicated to the continuous growth of our employees. Working with us comes with a variety of benefits, including:
   

  

* Travel Perks: Enjoy discounted travel opportunities around the world with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access to health and wellness benefits, including a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Receive discounts from a wide range of brands, as well as on transportation to and from airports, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our office location in Frösundavik offers a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and easy access to outdoor activities in Hagaparken and Brunnsviken. Engage in running, tennis, outdoor gym sessions, kayaking, and stand-up paddling with equipment available free of charge.
* Convenient Commute: Benefit from a non-stop bus service connecting our office to Solna station, and commuter trains, alongside a network of cycle paths.


**Our culture at SAS**
 At SAS, we are dedicated to caring for each other, delighting our travelers, and driving the transformation towards sustainable aviation. As a future colleague on our team, you’ll join a culture where we work collaboratively towards common goals, recognize each other's contributions, and celebrate successes. Our focus is on safe, sustainable, and punctual execution, and we are committed to protecting our planet while transforming SAS for the future. This is an empowering workplace where you can thrive, grow, and take ownership of your work. Join us at SAS and be part of shaping the future of aviation!
   

  

**Additional Information**
* Deadline for application: 26/01/2026. Please send us your CV as soon as possible, as interviews are conducted continuously, and the position may be filled before the application deadline. Note that we are not able to handle any applications that are sent by email, due to GDPR regulations.
* Desired start date: As soon as possible.
* Position: Fulltime (100%) starting with a 6-month probation period.
* This position is based in Frösundavik, Solna (Stockholm), and you will be expected to work onsite. Remote work may also be an option, depending on the agreement made with your manager.


 If you have any questions regarding the role, please contact recruiting leader Olivia Wasniewski, Head of EuroBonus Program, at olivia.wasniewski@sas.se
   

  

 Come and fly with us!

title: Cloud Engineer med Azure
description:
På Sogeti tror vi att det bästa finns inom oss alla. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller redan på toppen av ditt spel, kommer vi att uppmuntra dig att nå din fulla potential och bli bättre. Genom vår gemensamma passion för teknik, vår entreprenöriella kultur och vårt fokus på kontinuerligt lärande, kommer vi att ge dig allt du behöver för att göra ditt bästa arbete och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Rollen innebär att vara en nyckelspelare i vår digitala transformation och säkerställa att våra lösningar är skalbara, säkra och framtidssäkra.
   

  

*I den här rollen kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i:*
 Design och implementering av avancerade molnlösningar för våra kunder, ofta i hybridmiljöer.
   

  

 Arkitektur, säkerhet och automatisering av mölntjänster.
   

  

 Rådgivning i molnstrategiska frågor.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Erfarenhet av automatiserade byggpipelines och CI/CD-metoder samt implementering
   

  

 4+ års erfarenhet av Azure-arkitektur och implementation
   

  

 Djup förståelse för molnsäkerhet, nätverk och kostnadsoptimering
   

  

 Certifiering: Azure Solutions Architect  (eller motsvarande)
   

  

 Arbetat med komplexa migreringsprojekt
   

  

 Erfarenhet av automatiserade byggpipelines och CI/CD-metoder samt implementering
   

  

 Talar och skriver svenska flytande
   

  

 Tekniska kunskaper inom: Azure: App Services, Functions, Logic Apps, Azure SQL; IaC: Bicep, Terraform; CI/CD: Azure DevOps
   

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
 Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.
   

  

 Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
   

  

 Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.
   

  

 Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.
   

  

**Ansökan**
*Vi välkomnar varmt din ansökan idag, urvalet sker löpande! Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Team Manager, Camilla Lindberg på camilla.lindberg@sogeti.se*
*Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov.*
 Om Sogeti
   

  

 Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 19 kontor och 1200 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.

title: Data Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join a team that works to enable analysis and follow-up of assortment through reliable data and decision support. The team is in an ongoing transformation journey where new ways of working in data, analysis, and AI are gaining an increasingly important role. A central responsibility lies in the management and development of article master data, a business-critical data area that forms the basis for much of the business's analysis and is used by several other teams.
 



  





 In this role, you take overall responsibility for how data is modeled, refined, and made usable for analysis and decision-making. You work with data modeling and transformation, ensure high data quality, and drive best practices in code structure, documentation, and sustainable data solutions. The work is done in close collaboration with the business, other development teams, data architects, and source system owners, where you translate business needs into robust technical solutions and contribute to larger change and transformation initiatives.
 



  





**Qualifications:** 



* You have very good knowledge of SQL
* You have extensive experience with Data Vault and dimensional modeling (at least 5 years of documented and practical experience).
* You have experience with cloud-based data platforms such as GCP / BigQuery
* You are used to working with Git/GitHub or similar version management
* It is an advantage if you have experience with DBT and Looker.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, utveckling, elektronik och mekanik konstruktion. Vi arbetar med seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och samhällskritiska projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget, eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat? Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag – urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 Professional Galaxy söker en Lösningsarkitekt på uppdrag av vår klient.
   

  

**Kravprofil**
 Kundens beskrivning:
   

  

 Trafikverket i Stockholm söker en Lösningsarkitekt (nivå 4).
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning:**
 Uppdraget består av att projektera in och förädla digitalt anläggningsdata till Trafikverkets Järnvägssimulator. I uppdraget ingår även utveckling och expertstöd till förvaltning av Trafikverkets järnvägssimulator samt att uppdragsleda och utveckla digital arkitektur inom området anläggningsdata.
   

  

**SKALL-KRAV**
 Konsulten ska ha:
   

  

* Konsulten ska ha 5 års erfarenhet på att leda andra i arbete.
* Konsulten ska ha dokumenterad kunskap minst 4 år om användning av anläggningsdata inom ett transportsystem, t ex så som tågledning eller liknande.
* Konsulten ska ha dokumenterad kunskap med minst 4 år inom simulatorer av transportsystem så som tågledning eller liknande verksamhet.
* Konsulten ska ha dokumenterad teknisk kunskap minst 4 år om anläggningsuppdatering av simulatorer så som tågledning eller liknande verksamhet.
* Konsulten ska kunna påvisa kunskap om att kunna bygga testscenarier för simulatorer mot olika typer av transportsystem, så som tågledning eller liknande verksamhet.
* Behärska svenska språket i tal och skrift.


**MERITERANDE**
 N/A
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Omfattning: 100%
   

  

 Avtalslängd: 2026-02-01 till och med 2027-02-01, option på förlängning om 6 + 6 månader till och med 2028-02-01.
   

  

 Stationeringsort: Stockholm. Distansarbete får förekomma upp till 40% av omfattningen.
   

  

**Övrig information**
**Arbetsmodell:** 
 På plats
   

  

**Uppdragslängd:** 
 12 mån
   

  

**Uppdragsperiod:** 
 2026-02-01 till och med 2027-02-01, option på förlängning om 6 + 6 månader till och med 2028-02-01.
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2026-01-18
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.

title: Manager, Partner Solution Consulting – EMEA NORTH
description:
**Company Description**
 It all started in sunny San Diego, California in 2004 when a visionary engineer, Fred Luddy, saw the potential to transform how we work. Fast forward to today — ServiceNow stands as a global market leader, bringing innovative AI-enhanced technology to over 8,100 customers, including 85% of the Fortune 500®. Our intelligent cloud-based platform seamlessly connects people, systems, and processes to empower organizations to find smarter, faster, and better ways to work. But this is just the beginning of our journey. Join us as we pursue our purpose to make the world work better for everyone.
   

  

**Job Description**
**About the role**
 We are looking for an experienced and inspirational leader to join ServiceNow and manager the Partner Solution Consulting (PSC) team for EMEA NORTH. You will lead a diverse team of Partner Solution Consultants across multiple countries, driving strategic engagements with our partner ecosystem and supporting demand generation and pipeline growth.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead, coach, and inspire a multicultural pre-sales team from early career to senior consultants.
* Drive the evolution of our partner ecosystem to be AI-native.
* Lead partner Ready-to-Sell enablement and capacity-building initiatives aligned with EMEA South GPC strategies while adapting to regional needs to maximize growth and customer success.
* Support partners’ go-to-market execution and joint pipeline generation across EMEA South.
* Collaborate with Global Partner & Channel (GPC) leadership, Sales, Pre-Sales, and Marketing to prioritize efforts and scale partner impact.
* Represent ServiceNow with strategic partners and executive stakeholders as a trusted advisor.
* Support team members’ career development and align growth plans with business objectives.
* Monitor and report on Partner SC engagement, workload, KPIs, and ROI, identifying opportunities to optimize and scale.
* Ensure high levels of partner and stakeholder satisfaction through consistent communication and engagement levels.


**Qualifications**
**What we’re looking for**
* Experience in leveraging or critically thinking about how to integrate AI into work processes, decision-making, or problem-solving. This may include using AI-powered tools, automating workflows, analyzing AI-driven insights, or exploring AI's potential impact on the function or industry.
* 8+ years of pre-sales or solution consulting experience, ideally in CRM, AI, or related cloud industries.
* 3+ years managing partner-facing or pre-sales teams.
* Proficiency with ServiceNow AI business transformation platform or technical expertise in cloud software solutions.
* Experience with Global/Regional System Integrators, Service Providers, or Advisory firms.
* Strong leadership, coaching, and team-building skills; experience managing multicultural, distributed teams.
* Data-driven, structured management style focused on outcomes and continuous improvement.
* Proven ability to collaborate across Sales, Pre-Sales, Partner, Marketing, and Product teams to maximize partner impact.
* Excellent communication and storytelling skills for both technical and executive audiences.
* Fluency in English; additional European languages are a plus


**Why join us?**
 This is a unique opportunity to lead at the intersection of partner strategy, technology innovation, and business growth. If you are passionate about enabling partners, developing talent, and making an impact across a diverse region, we would love to hear from you.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

**Work Personas**
 We approach our distributed world of work with flexibility and trust. Work personas (flexible, remote, or required in office) are categories that are assigned to ServiceNow employees depending on the nature of their work and their assigned work location. Learn more here. To determine eligibility for a work persona, ServiceNow may confirm the distance between your primary residence and the closest ServiceNow office using a third-party service.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 ServiceNow is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other category protected by law. In addition, all qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with legal requirements.
   

  

**Accommodations**
 We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are unable to use this online application and need an alternative method to apply, please contact globaltalentss@servicenow.com for assistance.
   

  

**Export Control Regulations**
 For positions requiring access to controlled technology subject to export control regulations, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may be required to obtain export control approval from government authorities for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by relevant export control authorities.
   

  

 From Fortune. ©2025 Fortune Media IP Limited. All rights reserved. Used under license.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Job Description
